name: Ext_R4B_MedicationAdministration_medication
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.MedicationAdministration.medication[x] for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationAdministration.medication[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationAdministration|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: Identifies the medication that was administered. This is either a link to a resource representing the details of the medication or a simple attribute carrying a code that identifies the medication from a known list of medications.
element.comment: `MedicationAdministration.medication[x]` maps to R5 `MedicationAdministration.medication`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: Identifies the medication that was administered. This is either a link to a resource representing the details of the medication or a simple attribute carrying a code that identifies the medication from a known list of medications.
element.comment: `MedicationAdministration.medication[x]` maps to R5 `MedicationAdministration.medication`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Codes identifying substance or product that can be administered.
